# Data process


## Cuba

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** |`PFRDNUM`|`PNEINUM`|
|-|-|-|
| **Label** |`number of close friends`|`number of close neighbours`|
| **Table name** |`1066-Cuba-Baseline`|`1066-Cuba-Baseline`|
| **Units** |`people`|`people`|
| **Description** |  |  |


```{r assign1 cuba, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 't1066_cuba_w1_clspeop','10-66.1066-Cuba-Baseline',variables=list('PFRDNUM', 'PNEINUM'), missings = TRUE)
t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop <- opal.execute(o,'t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop')
```

```{r local1 cuba, echo=F}

vari <- t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`) 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")

ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop, aes(PFRDNUM)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Number of close friends") + ylab("Frequency")

vari <- t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`) 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")

ggplot(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop, aes(PNEINUM)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Number of close neighbours") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `PFRDNUM=0 $ PNEINUM=0 into 0`
* `PFRDNUM>0 OR PNEINUM>0 into SUM(PFRDNUM, PNEINUM)`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1 cuba, echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_cuba_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$id)

t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM), "NA='-999'")
t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM), "NA='-999'")

t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop <- c(NA) 
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop)[1]){
  if(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] == 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] == 0) { 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop[i] = 0 }
  else if(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop[i] = sum(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i], t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i]) }
  else if(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] <= 0){ 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop[i] = t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] }
  else if(t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] <= 0 & t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop[i] = t1066_cuba_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] }
}

t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop <- labelled(t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop, labels = c("lack of close people"=0, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript1 cuba, echo=F}
vari <- t1066_ds_cuba_w1$clspeop
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vari, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = miss_values_vector)$summary, caption = "Summary")

ggplot(t1066_ds_cuba_w1, aes(clspeop)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue", data = .%>% filter(!vari %in% miss_values_vector)) + xlab("The number of close people: friends, neighbours or co-workers") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation1 cuba, echo=F}

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `PFRDNUM=0 $ PNEINUM=0 into 0`
* `PFRDNUM>0 OR PNEINUM>0 into SUM(PFRDNUM, PNEINUM)`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1 PR, echo=TRUE}
t1066_ds_PR_w1 <- tibble(id=t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$id)

t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM), "NA='-999'")
t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM), "NA='-999'")

t1066_ds_PR_w1$clspeop <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(t1066_PR_w1_clspeop)[1]){
  if(t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] == 0 & t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] == 0) { 
    t1066_ds_PR_w1$clspeop[i] = 0 }
  else if(t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_PR_w1$clspeop[i] = sum(t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i],t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i]) }
  else if(t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] > 0 & t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] <= 0){ 
    t1066_ds_PR_w1$clspeop[i] = t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] }
  else if(t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PFRDNUM[i] <= 0 & t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] > 0){ 
    t1066_ds_PR_w1$clspeop[i] = t1066_PR_w1_clspeop$PNEINUM[i] }
}

t1066_ds_PR_w1$clspeop <- car::recode(as.vector(t1066_ds_PR_w1$clspeop), "NA='999'")
t1066_ds_PR_w1$clspeop <- labelled(t1066_ds_PR_w1$clspeop, labels = c("lack of close people"=0, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

## Summary of descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves

```{r helpfunctions, echo=F}

labelling <- function(l.hds,m.hds){
  
  # Labelling of the tibbles and creating new tibbles with all missings recodified as NA

  for(name in names(l.hds)) {
    # In the aux_object we copy the old tibble to recodify all missing values as NA.
    aux_object <- l.hds[[name]]
    # Labelling of variables
    label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label
    # Labelling of categories (for continues variables, only missing values)
    l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cont_label)
    aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
    # Saving the recodified tibble in list m.hds
    m.hds[[name]] <- aux_object
    rm(aux_object)
  }
  return(list(l.hds,m.hds))

}

# Creation of summary tables

summaries <- function(l.hds,m.hds,lnames){

  # Creation of column with summary table categories
  t.summ <- summary(m.hds[[1]][2])[1:6]
  # Adding of missing/no-missing values categories
  t.hds <- c(substr(t.summ,1,regexpr(":", t.summ, fixed=T)-1),labels(Continuous_summary(l.hds[[1]][[2]],missing_values = miss_values_vector)$values_table)[[2]])
  # For each wave/population in l.hds, add the correponding values
  for (i in seq_along(l.hds)){
    # First, summary values
    t.summ <- summary(m.hds[[i]][2])[1:6]
    # Next, missing/no-missing values
    t.hds <- cbind(t.hds,c(as.numeric(substr(t.summ,regexpr(":", t.summ, fixed=T)+1,nchar(t.summ))),as.numeric(Continuous_summary(l.hds[[i]][[2]],missing_values = miss_values_vector)$values_table[1,])))
  }
  # Add sample size for each wave/population
  t.hds <- rbind(t.hds,c("sample size", sapply(l.hds,function(wave) length(wave[[1]]))))
  # Add wave/population names
  dimnames(t.hds)[[2]] <- c(dimnames(summary(m.hds[[1]][2]))[[2]],lnames)
  return(t.hds)
  
}

# Save data tables

savingRD <- function(l.hds,vbl_name){
  
  for(index in seq_along(l.hds)){
    assign(vbl_name,l.hds[[index]])
    save(vbl_name,list = vbl_name, file = paste0(datafolder,names(l.hds)[index],"/",vbl_name,".RData"))
  }
  
}
```
